Name: InstanceNormalization
Description: Node that does instance normalization. This is normalization across chanenls.

Properties.Name: mean
Properties.Description: Mean of the normalized outputs. Default 1.

Properties.Name: stddev
Properties.Description: Standard deviation of the normalized outputs. Default 1.

Functions.Name: newLayer
Functions.Description: Creates a new layer instead of importing the layer.

Functions.Name: exportLayer

MandatoryArgs.Name: path
MandatoryArgs.Description: Path the network is being saved to.

MandatoryArgs.Name: subdir
MandatoryArgs.Description: Subdirectory within path where this layer is being saved to.

Functions.Description: Saves this layer to a specified folder.

Functions.Name: importLayer

MandatoryArgs.Name: path
MandatoryArgs.Description: Path the network is being saved to.

MandatoryArgs.Name: subdir
MandatoryArgs.Description: Subdirectory within path where this layer is being saved to.

Functions.Description: Loads this layer from a specified folder. Requires three files: [path]/[subdir]/mat.weights, [path]/[subdir]:mat.biases, [path]/[subdir]/hyper.txt  . This does not build the node. The node must have connections set then be built before use.

MandatoryArgs.Name: connections
MandatoryArgs.Description: List of nodes. All nodes after first will be ignored

Functions.Name: execute

MandatoryArgs.Name: inputs
MandatoryArgs.Description: A tf.Tensor from each input connection.

Functions.Description: Performs instance normalization on the last axis of the inputs
